effect:
Desolate Land creates extremely harsh sunlight when the ability is activated (by Groudon reverting to its Primal form).
Extremely harsh sunlight has the same effects as harsh sunlight but with some additions:
The abilities Cloud Nine or Air Lock are still able to bypass the effects of Desolate Land, but Mold Breaker is not.
description: The Pok√©mon changes the weather to nullify Water-type attacks.
